Welcome to the
Concur Expense self-guided demo.

Imagine you are traveling to a business conference where you'll need to expense your travel, food, and lodging for reimbursement. This brief demo will show you how to capture expenses from any device, submit an expense report to your manager, and learn what it looks like to approve a report.
